hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
